objects.text:
• Premium Canvas Material
• Lightweight Cushioned Comfort
• Versatile Urban Style Design
• Durable Metal Eyelets

product_details.name: Classic Canvas Comfort: Urban Style Navy Sneakers
product_details.description:
• Premium navy blue canvas material for durability and breathability
• Clean minimalist design perfect for casual and smart-casual outfits
• Lightweight white rubber sole for all-day comfort
• Metal eyelets and classic lace-up design for secure fit
• Versatile color that pairs well with any outfit
• Cushioned insole for enhanced comfort
• Easy-to-clean canvas upper material
• Sleek white contrast sole adds modern style
• Perfect for everyday wear, from office to weekend outings
• Available in unisex sizing for universal appeal

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, geometric layout divided into four color-blocked quadrants. The upper-left and lower-left sections are shades of navy and cobalt blue, while the right half balances with lighter tones of sky blue and light gray. The main focus is a pair of stylish navy sneakers shown prominently in the top-right. Text layers ("heading", "subheading", "description", "price", and "cta") are styled in bold modern typography, offering product highlights and call-to-action messaging. Decorative elements include curved accent lines, circular pagination indicators, and diagonal stroke overlays creating visual depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue (#1E3A8A)
- Cobalt Blue (#2563EB)
- Sky Blue (#3B82F6)
- Light Gray (#E2E8F0)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a minimalist canvas shoe predominantly in a deep navy blue shade (#1D3C6A), which conveys a sense of casual elegance. The fabric exhibits subtle texture variations, adding visual interest through tonal shifts in the blue fabric. Eyelets and lace tips are metallic silver (#C0C0C0), offering contrast and highlighting the structure. The rubber soles are a crisp light grayish-blue (#DCE6F1), effectively balancing the darker upper. This color palette—dominated by navy blue, accented by silver and light gray-blue—can be echoed in an ad banner to evoke a modern, clean, and stylish aesthetic while drawing attention to the refined simplicity of the design.
